Function reference

All functions

World NLD_prov NLD_muni
World and Netherlands map

Axis labels

Deprecated tmap functions
land
Spatial data of global land cover
metro
Spatial data of metropolitan areas
`+`(<tmap>)
Stacking of tmap elements
print(<tmap>) knit_print.tmap()
Draw thematic map
qtm()
Quick thematic map plot
renderTmap() tmapOutput() tmapProxy() tm_remove_layer()
Wrapper functions for using tmap in shiny
rivers
Spatial data of rivers
theme_ps()
ggplot2 theme for proportional symbols
tm_add_legend()
Add manual legend
tm_compass()
Map compass
tm_credits()
Credits text
tm_facets()
Small multiples
tm_grid() tm_graticules()
Coordinate grid / graticule lines
tm_iso()
Draw iso (contour) lines with labels
tm_layout() tm_legend() tm_style() tm_format()
Layout of cartographic maps
tm_lines()
Draw spatial lines
tm_logo()
Logo
tm_minimap()
Minimap
tm_mouse_coordinates()
Mouse coordinates
tm_fill() tm_borders() tm_polygons()
Draw polygons
tm_raster() tm_rgb() tm_rgba()
Draw a raster
tm_scale_bar()
Scale bar
tm_sf()
Draw simple features
tm_shape()
Specify the shape object
tm_symbols() tm_squares() tm_bubbles() tm_dots() tm_markers()
Draw symbols
tm_text()
Add text labels
tm_basemap() tm_tiles()
Draw a tile layer

Options for the interactive tmap viewer

tmap element
tmap-package tmap
Thematic Map Visualization
tmap_animation()
Create animation
tmap_arrange() knit_print.tmap_arrange() print(<tmap_arrange>)

Set the design mode
tmap_format() tmap_format_add()
Get or add format options
tmap_grob()
Export to grob object
tmap_icons() marker_icon()
Specify icons
tmap_last()
Retrieve the last map to be modified or created
tmap_leaflet()
Create a leaflet widget from a tmap object
tmap_mode() ttm() ttmp()
Set tmap mode to static plotting or interactive viewing
tmap_options() tmap_options_diff() tmap_options_reset() tmap_options_save()
Options for tmap
tmap_save()
Save tmap
tmap_style()
Set or get the default tmap style
tmap_style_catalogue() tmap_style_catalog()
Create a style catalogue
tmap_tip()
Get a tip about tmap
